item.description:
Whale Watch! How exciting! I've never been on a Whale Watch before! Cape Ann Whale Watch's "Hurricane II" is an awesome 115' vessel with cruising speeds up to 25 knots and has a capacity for 220 guests! This should be a fun adventure!

If we get a group of 10 people, ticket prices are only $25.00 per person. My two tickets were previously purchased through Groupon at $37.00 each and don’t count towards fulfilling the headcount of 10 for the special group rate of $25.00 each.

I made a reservation under the name of "Jillian's Meetup", so you won't need to RSVP to Cape Ann Whale Watch.

Getting there:

Gloucester is just under a 2-hour drive from Providence. The Whale Watch starts at 1:30pm. We need to arrive by 1:00pm for check-in. Meet for carpooling and caravan at 10:00am in the parking lot of Benny's. Benny's is located at 66 Branch Avenue, Providence, near the Exit 23 northbound exit ramp of I-95 (take Exit 24 if southbound on I-95). Let's coordinate details in the comments/ conversation section below, or of course by direct email.

Pre-payment information:

In order to secure group rate pricing of $25.00 each, I am asking everyone who RSVP’s “yes” for this event for their $25.00 payment. I need to collect payment by Monday, July 30th. RSVP’s will close on July 28th at 1:00pm.

My two tickets were previously purchased through Groupon at $37.00 each and don’t count towards fulfilling the headcount of 10 for the special group rate of $25.00 each. The regular price is $48.00/adult.

Refund Policy:

Refunds will be made if we re-schedule the event due to inclement weather.

On Tuesday, July 31st, I will notify everyone who RSVP’d “yes” whether or not we have 10 pre-paid members/ guests.

If we don’t have 10 pre-paid members/guests to get the special group rate price, you can then decide if you want a refund of your money, or if you want to pay the balance of $23.00 directly to Cape Ann when we arrive for the Whale Watch; they accept CASH, VISA, Mastercard and American Express. There will be no refunds if we have 10 pre-paid members/ guests, however, you can arrange for someone else to take your place.

Payment options:

1)

Mail a local check or money order to me as soon as possible so that I am assured receipt by July 30th.  I will provide "yes" RSVP's with my mailing address.

2)

Coordinate with me to collect $25.00 cash from you by July 30th.

3)

PayPal. You can set up a free PayPal account at www.PayPal.com or you can access it through popular websites such as EBay and Amazon.  There are no fees to send a payment, however, PayPal charges a $1.00 fee to receive payment.  Please make your payment for $26.00.

----

Please visit Cape Ann Whale Watch’s exciting website:

Website: http://www.seethewhales.com/general.htm#2008%20Schedule

Phone number (800-877-5110)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet for carpooling at 10:00am --> Benny's at 66 Branch Ave. Providence
item.name: Cape Ann Whale Watch, $25 each for 10 people
